review: This is great. What makes it shine is the audio feature of just saying what you want to watch.

review: I really am enjoying this and ordered 3 Fire sticks for the other TVs in my home.  After researching other comparable devices I decided on Amazon Fire TV not only because it beat Roku and Chromecast in a side-to-side comparison, but because I'm a long time Amazon customer and Prime member.
author: Malcolm E. Guidry

review: Best streaming device on the market.
author: O. Lawson

review: You can only stream one album at a time. You must then select another album to continue. Annoying when you listen to music at home. The selection process is very fast.
author: Cleo Cudd

review: I love this product.  Picture clarity is unreal!!  Easy to use and I'm old!
author: Trina

review: This product, has changed the way we watch TV now.
